item.title: Ukulele Time: Penny Lane - The Beatles - Keys of C, E♭
item.description: Play along video for the song Penny Lane from the channel Ukulele Time. Artist: The Beatles. Chords: Am, Am7♭5, A♭, B♭, C, Cm, Dm, E♭, F, G7.
